#include <cstdio>
#include <cstring>
#include <cmath>
#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>

#define MAX 1010
#define EPS 1e-5
#define PI 3.14159265


using namespace std;

struct ponto{
    int x,y;
    double ang;

    bool operator<(const ponto& aux) const{

        if(ang != aux.ang) return ang < aux.ang;
        if(x!= aux.x) return x<aux.x;
        return y<aux.y;

    }
}pontos[MAX];

ponto aux[MAX];
int n,caso;

int main(void){

    int t;

    scanf("%d",&t);

    while(t--){
        scanf("%d",&n);

        //if(!n) return 0;

        for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
            scanf("%d %d",&pontos[i].x,&pontos[i].y);
        }

        int maior=2;


        for(int i=0;i<n;i++){

            int tam=0;
            for(int j=i+1;j<n;j++){
               // if(i == j) continue;
                aux[tam]=pontos[j];
                aux[tam].ang= (double)(pontos[j].y-pontos[i].y) / (double)(pontos[j].x-pontos[i].x);
                //while(aux[tam].ang<=0.0) aux[tam].ang+=PI;
               // if(i == 0) cout << "ang: " << aux[tam].ang << endl;
                tam++;
            }

            sort(aux,aux+tam);

            int cont=2;
            for(int j=0;j<tam-1;j++){
                //    if(i == 0) cout << "ang: " << aux[j].ang << endl;

                if( aux[j].ang == aux[j+1].ang ){
                    cont++;
                }else{
                    cont=2;
                }

                if(cont>maior) maior=cont;

            }

        }

       // printf("MAIOR:%d\n",maior);

        if(n == 1) printf("1\n");
        else printf("%d\n",maior);

      //  if(maior < 4) printf("Photo %d: %d points eliminated\n",++caso,0);
        //else printf("Photo %d: %d points eliminated\n",++caso,maior);

    }


    return 0;


}
